html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12782024-11-29PSPC, CPC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Post Corporation Act
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA POST CORPORATION ACT in order to increase the rates by weighted average of $0.25 or 25.2% in the Letter Mail Regulations, the International Letter-post Items Regulations, and the Special Services and Fees Regulations.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA POST CORPORATION ACT in order to increase the rates by weighted average of $0.25 or 25.2% in the Letter Mail Regulations, the International Letter-post Items Regulations, and the Special Services and Fees Regulations.
